My Lord, I seek protection with You from: Rabbim, men shaytonlarning vasvasalaridan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman; va ular menga yaqinlashishidan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman. (23:97-98).
Allah is sufficient for me. There is no: Alloh menga yetarli. Uning o‘rniga ibodatga loyiq bo‘lgan hech qanday iloh yo‘q. Men faqat Unga ishonaman va U Buyuk Taxtning Rabbidir.
My Lord, truly I am in dire need of any: Rabbim, albatta, menga jo‘natgan har qanday yaxshilikka muhtojman. (28:24)
My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Yo: Rabbim, menga va ota-onamga bergan ne’mating uchun minnatdor bo‘lishni nasib et, va Senga yoqadigan yaxshi ishlarga qo‘l urishni nasib et. O‘z rahmatin bilan meni Sening solih bandalaringdan qilib qo‘y.
O Allah, grant us the best outcome in al: Ey Alloh, barcha ishlarimizda eng yaxshi natijani nasib et va bizni bu dunyoning qahridan va oxiratning azobidan saqla.
O Allah, all the favours that I or anyon: Ey Alloh, men yoki Sening yaratganlaringdan kimdir ertalab olgan barcha ne’matlar faqat Seningdandir. Sening sheriging yo‘q. Faqat Sening o‘zing barcha maqtov va shukrga loyiqsan.
Oh Allah, if my intended action is best: Ey Alloh, agar mening niyat qilgan ishlarim menga yaxshilik keltirsa, uni amalga oshirishni osonlashtir va unda menga O‘z barakatingni nasib et.
All praise is for Allah, Who provided us: Barcha maqtovlar Allohga, bizga ovqat va ichimlik bergan, ehtiyojimizni qondirgan va boshpanamizni ta’minlagan zotga. Nechta odamlar ularni qondiradigan yoki ularni boshpanaga oladigan hech kimga ega emas.
O Allah, I seek Your protection from anx: Ey Alloh, men xavotir va qayg‘udan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman. Men beparvolik va dangasalikdan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman. Men qo‘rqoqlik va sarmoya yetishmovchiligidan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman, hamda qarzdan va odamlar tomonidan bosim ostida qolishdan Sening himoyangni so‘rayman.
My Lord, I have certainly wronged myself: Rabbim, men albatta o‘zimga zulm qildim, shuning uchun menga mag‘firat et.
All praise is for Allah through whose bl: Barcha maqtovlar Allohga, uning barakasi bilan to‘g‘ri ishlarga erishiladi.
To Allah we belong and unto Him is our r: Biz Allohning malikasimiz va unga qaytamiz. Ey Alloh, mening sinovim uchun menga javob ber va uni yaxshiroq narsaga almashtir.
Ey Alloh, qalbimdagi g‘azabni olib tashla.
Ey Doimiy Tirik, Barcha narsalarni qo‘llab-quvvatlovchi; men Sening rahmating orqali yordam so‘rayman. Barcha ishlarimni to‘g‘rilashni so‘rayman va menga o‘zimni bir lahza ham bo‘lsa o‘zimga topshirma.
I seek protection in the perfect words o: Men Allohning g‘azabidan va jazosidan, Uning qullarining yomonliklaridan, shaytonlarning yomon g‘oyalari va ularning menga ko‘rinishidan mukammal so‘zlariga himoya so‘rayman.
